alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Faulkner (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued November 04 at 11:30PM CDT until November 04 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN INDEPENDENCE...SOUTHWESTERN JACKSON...CLEBURNE... NORTHEASTERN FAULKNER AND NORTHWESTERN WHITE COUNTIES... At 1129 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Batesville to 8 miles south of Concord to near Gravel Hill, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Heber Springs... Greers Ferry... Quitman... Pangburn... Rose Bud... Pleasant Plains... Enola... Concord... Mount Vernon... Crosby... Gravel Hill... Steprock... Southside in Independence Count... Salado... Holland... Letona... Albion... Barney... Hickory Flat... Wilburn... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for central and north central Arkansas. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for eastern, central and north central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
